Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Kitty P
Reviews.Content: After reading all the cell phone horror stories on amazing I was kind of iffy about actually buying a phone on here but I'm quite happy that I did. All in all for what it cost this was a very good purchase. It came in the original box with all the original blackberry accesories. It was clearly a refurbished phone but it was unlocked everything worked right and months later it is still working very well. I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: imperfecto
Reviews.Author: LUCA1975
Reviews.Content: il mobile e arrivato a me con numerosi ammaccature e grafiature nello schermo...funziona perfettamente...ho dovuto comprare il cover frontale nuovo

Reviews.Title: ALL GOOD
Reviews.Author: Yehiser
Reviews.Content: Everything works perfectly, very good buy. THE WORKS PERFECTLY TLF. All buttons are GOOD AND PERFORMANCE WAS GOOD. THANK YOU
